00001 W.dxul.textbox = function(node){var props = node.getAttributeNames();
00002     this.tagName = 'textbox';
00003     // set Attributes and Properties common to all XUL elements
00004     this.init(node);
00005 
00006     this.core = W.style('input', 'width:100%');
00007     for(var i in props){
00008         if(props[i] == 'multiline' && node.getAttribute(props[i]) == 'true'){
00009             this.core = W.style('textarea');
00010             this.core.rows = 3;
00011         }
00012     }
00013     
00014     for(var i in props){
00015         var prop = node.getAttribute(props[i]);
00016         switch(props[i]){
00017              case 'readonly':
00018                   if(prop == 'yes')
00019                        this.core.readOnly = true;
00020                   break;
00021              case 'value':
00022                   this.core.value = prop;
00023                   break;
00024         }
00025     }
00026     
00027     if(node.parent.tagName == 'groupbox'){
00028         node.parent.core.appendChild(this.core);
00029     }
00030 };
00031 W.dxul.textbox.prototype = new W.dxul.XULElement();
